Text: A really great collection of wonderful graffiti art! Many thanks for posting this for us! *thumbsup*

BladeRunner12, Thank you for your comment. In the future I will try to lay out about 30 GB of photos with graffiti. I would like to divide the walls into two categories - Street art and the bombing, but I'm afraid I do not have the patience for this job :-D . I apologize in advance for any errors in the construction of the text, but my native language - Russian and hard for me to express their thoughts in English.
